snippet: The popularity of Pope Francis may change the shape of his church.
abstract: Op-Ed article by author Peter Manseau contends kinder and gentler Catholicism projected by Pope Francis has made many former and lapsed Catholics reconsider the possibilities of being Catholic; examines what it means to be Catholic, particularly in light of the growing number of independent Catholic churches.
lead_paragraph: The popularity of Pope Francis may change the shape of his church.

headline.main: What It Means to Be Catholic Now
headline.print_headline: What It Means to Be Catholic Now
